Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.name: default(msg:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.abstract: Emits any message if the log level is equal to or lower than default level.

Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.name: debug(debugFunction:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.abstract: Calls debugFunction only if the log level is debug and emits the

Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.name: info(msg:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.abstract: Emits an info message if the log level is equal to or lower than info level.

Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.name: fault(msg:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.abstract: Emits a fault message if the log level is equal to or lower than fault level.

Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.name: error(msg:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/c:@M@AmazonChimeS.abstract: Emits an error message if the log level is equal to or lower than error level.

Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.name: attendeesDidJoin(attendeeInfo:)
Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.abstract: List attendees that are newly added to the meeting

Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.name: attendeesDidMute(attendeeInfo:)
Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.abstract: List attendees that are newly muted in the meeting

Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.name: attendeesDidUnmute(attendeeInfo:)
Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html#/c:@M@Am.abstract: List attendees that newly unmuted from the meeting

Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.name: realtimeLocalUnmute()
Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.abstract: Unmutes the audio input if currently allowed

Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.name: addRealtimeObserver(observer:)
Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.abstract: Subscribes to real time events with an observer

Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.name: removeRealtimeObserver(observer:)
Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html#.abstract: Unsubscribes from real time events by removing the specified observer

Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.name: videoTileDidAdd(tileState:)
Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.abstract: Called whenever a new attendee starts sharing the video

Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.name: videoTileDidRemove(tileState:)
Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.abstract: Called whenever any attendee stops sharing the video

Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.name: videoTileDidPause(tileState:)
Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.abstract: Called whenever an attendee tile pauseState changes from .unpaused

Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.name: videoTileDidResume(tileState:)
Protocols/VideoTileObserver.html#/c:@M@A.abstract: Called whenever an attendee tile pauseState changes to .unpaused

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Binds the video rendering view to Video Tile. The view will start displaying the video frame

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.name: unbindVideoView(tileId:)
Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Unbinds the video rendering view from Video Tile. The view will stop displaying the video frame

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Subscribe to Video Tile events with an VideoTileObserver.

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.name: removeVideoTileObserver(observer:)
Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Unsubscribes from Video Tile events by removing specified VideoTileObserver.

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.name: pauseRemoteVideoTile(tileId:)
Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Pauses remote video tile, if it exists.

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.name: resumeRemoteVideoTile(tileId:)
Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: Resume remote video tile, if it exists.

Protocols/VideoTileController.html#/c:@M.name: onReceiveFrame(frame:attendeeId:pauseState:videoId:)
Protocols/VideoTileController.html#/c:@M.abstract: Called whenever there is a new Video frame received for any of the attendee in the meeting

Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: videoRenderView
Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: View which will be used to render the Video Frame

Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: bind(videoRenderView:)
Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: Binds the view to the tile. The view needs to be create by the application.

Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: renderFrame(frame:)
Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: Renders the frame on videoRenderView. The call will be silently ignored if the view has not been bind

Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: setPauseState(pauseState:)
Protocols/VideoTile.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: Update the pause state of the tile.

Protocols/MetricsObserver.html#/c:@M@Ama.name: metricsDidReceive(metrics:)
Protocols/MetricsObserver.html#/c:@M@Ama.abstract: Called when metrics are collected and ready

Protocols/Scheduler.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: start()
Protocols/Scheduler.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: Schedules the callback according to the implementation.

Protocols/Scheduler.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.name: stop()
Protocols/Scheduler.html#/c:@M@AmazonChi.abstract: Unschedules the callback and prevents it from being called anymore.

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerPolicy.html#/c:@M.name: calculateScore(attendeeInfo:volume:)
Protocols/ActiveSpeakerPolicy.html#/c:@M.abstract: Return the score of the speaker. If the score is 0, this speaker is not active.

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerPolicy.html#/c:@M.abstract: Indicates whether the audio video controller is allowed to increase video send bandwidth

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerObserver.html#/c:.abstract: Observes the active speaker scores at frequency scoresCallbackIntervalMs

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerObserver.html#/c:.abstract: Observes changes in list of active speakers

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerDetectorFacade.ht.abstract: Starts the active speaker detector on the callback for the given policy.

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerDetectorFacade.ht.name: removeActiveSpeakerObserver(observer:)
Protocols/ActiveSpeakerDetectorFacade.ht.abstract: Stops the active speaker detector callback from being called.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the audio session is connecting or reconnecting.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the audio session has started.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the audio reconnection is canceled.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.name: connectionDidRecover()
Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the connection health is recovered.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.name: videoSessionDidStartConnecting()
Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the video session is connecting or reconnecting.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.name: videoSessionDidStartWithStatus(sessionStatus:)
Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the video session has started.

Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.name: videoSessionDidStopWithStatus(sessionStatus:)
Protocols/AudioVideoObserver.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Called when the video session has stopped from a started state with the reason

Protocols/AudioVideoControllerFacade.htm.abstract: Stop AudioVideo Controller. This will exit the meeting

Protocols/AudioVideoControllerFacade.htm.name: startRemoteVideo()
Protocols/AudioVideoControllerFacade.htm.abstract: Enable remote video to start receiving streams

Protocols/AudioVideoControllerFacade.htm.abstract: Disable remote video to stop receiving streams

Protocols/AudioVideoControllerFacade.htm.abstract: AudioVideoControllerFacade manages the signaling and peer connections.

Protocols/ActiveSpeakerObserver.html.name: ActiveSpeakerObserver
Protocols/ActiveSpeakerObserver.html.abstract: ActiveSpeakerObserver handles event related to finding active speaker and corresponding scores

Protocols/Scheduler.html.name: Scheduler
Protocols/Scheduler.html.abstract: Scheduler calls a callback on the schedule determined by the implementation.

Protocols/MetricsObserver.html.name: MetricsObserver
Protocols/MetricsObserver.html.abstract: MetricsObserver handles events related to audio/video metrics.

Protocols/VideoTile.html.name: VideoTile
Protocols/VideoTile.html.abstract: VideoTile is a tile that binds video render view to diplay the frame into the view.

Protocols/VideoTileControllerFacade.html.abstract: VideoTileControllerFacade allows one to control VideoTile. The caller is responsible for laying

Protocols/DeviceChangeObserver.html.abstract: DeviceChangeObserver listens to the change of Audio Device.

Protocols/DeviceController.html.abstract: DeviceController keeps track of the devices being used for audio device

Protocols/RealtimeControllerFacade.html.abstract: RealtimeControllerFacade controls aspects meetings concerning realtime UX

Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html.name: RealtimeObserver
Protocols/RealtimeObserver.html.abstract: RealtimeObserver handles event that happens in realtime,

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: connectionHealthReconnect
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: Due to connection health a reconnect has been triggered.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: networkBecomePoor
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: Network is not good enough for VoIP.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: audioInternalServerError
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: There was an internal server error with the audio leg.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: audioAuthenticationRejected
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: Authentication was rejected. The client is not allowed on this call.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: audioCallAtCapacity
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: The client can not join because the call is at capacity.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: audioServiceUnavailable
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: Could not connect the audio leg due to the service being unavailable.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: audioDisconnectAudio
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: The attendee should explicitly switch itself from joined with audio to checked-in.

Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.name: unknown
Enums/MeetingSessionStatusCode.html#/c:@.abstract: If State cannot be parsed, then use this state.

Enums/VideoPauseState.html#/c:@M@AmazonC.name: pausedByUserRequest
Enums/VideoPauseState.html#/c:@M@AmazonC.abstract: The video tile has been paused by the user, and will only be unpaused if the user requests it to resume.

Enums/VideoPauseState.html#/c:@M@AmazonC.name: pausedForPoorConnection
Enums/VideoPauseState.html#/c:@M@AmazonC.abstract: The video tile has been paused to save on local downlink bandwidth. When the connection improves,

Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.abstract: Percentage of audio packets lost from server to client

Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.name: audioSendPacketLossPercent
Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.abstract: Percentage of audio packets lost from client to server

Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.name: videoAvailableSendBandwidth
Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.abstract: Estimated uplink bandwidth from perspective of video client

Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.name: videoSendBitrate
Enums/ObservableMetric.html#/c:@M@Amazon.abstract: Sum of total bitrate across all send streams

Enums/VolumeLevel.html#/c:@M@AmazonChime.abstract: The attendee is speaking at low volume

Enums/ObservableMetric.html.abstract: ObservableMetric types represents filtered metrics that are intended to propagate to the

Enums/VideoPauseState.html.abstract: VideoPauseState describes the pause status of a video tile.

Classes/MeetingSessionURLs.html#/c:@M@Am.name: turnControlUrl
Classes/MeetingSessionURLs.html#/c:@M@Am.abstract: The TURN control URL of the session

Classes/MeetingSessionCredentials.html#/.name: joinToken

Classes/MeetingSessionConfiguration.html.abstract: The credentials used to authenticate the session.

Classes/MeetingSessionConfiguration.html.name: MeetingSessionConfiguration
Classes/MeetingSessionConfiguration.html.abstract: MeetingSessionConfiguration contains the information necessary to start a session.

Classes/MeetingSessionCredentials.html.abstract: MeetingSessionCredentials includes the credentials used to authenticate.
